newsitem.title: POLAND: New Polish daily Zycie to be launched on Saturday.
newsitem.headline: New Polish daily Zycie to be launched on Saturday.

text.p: Leading journalists of the Polish daily "Zycie Warszawy", who quit it over its editorial line, and the axed television programme Puls Dnia are launching a new daily "Zycie" on Saturday, the newspaper's editor said.

Tomasz Wolek told a news conference the political nation- wide daily will have a circulation of 200,000 copies and will be published by a Polish-German joint venture, but did not give any financial details of the company.
"I believe there is a gap on the Polish newspaper market between the (politically centre-oriented) Gazeta Wyborcza to Gazeta Polska (extreme right) and we want to fill the gap ...,"Wolek said.
"I wouldn't call it right-wing, we will be an independent newspaper", he said.
